references.paper_title: Self-supervised learning from images with a joint-embedding predictive architecture
references.reason: This paper introduces the I-JEPA framework, which is the basis for the proposed C-JEPA and is extensively analyzed and compared throughout the current paper.

references.paper_title: VICReg: Variance-invariance-covariance regularization for self-supervised learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the VICReg method which is integrated into the I-JEPA framework to form the C-JEPA, and is key to the core contribution of this work.

references.paper_title: Masked autoencoders are scalable vision learners
references.reason: This paper is a major advancement in self-supervised visual representation learning that provides a strong baseline for comparison in terms of performance and methodology.
This paper provides a related method to the I-JEPA, and is referenced when comparing the theoretical underpinnings and empirical differences between I-JEPA and SimSiam.

references.paper_title: A simple framework for contrastive learning of visual representations
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work in contrastive learning that is closely related to the field of study, and is referenced in discussion of related work.
